title: Trending Nightgeist 6/3: Attack the Block, Bunker Boy, Pete Carroll, Fascism/AntiFa
itunes:title: Trending Nightgeist 6/3: Attack the Block, Bunker Boy, Pete Carroll, Fascism/AntiFa
description:
On this edition of Trending Nightgeist Jack and Miles discuss John Boyega speaking out against Racism, Trump tried to make up some nonsense about why he hid in the bunker during the protests, Pete Carroll speaks highly of Colin Kaepernick after not giving him a contract, and the FBI is apparently screening any person who gets arrested during protests about whether they are "involved" with "ANTIFA".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
